description:
Integrate your web app with Discord services

Supplies Discord login service plus the ability to send chat messages to text channels using the discord webhook feature want to help me build a better plugin with emojis and more please join me at http://join.dislist.me *(vanity discord invite)
name: Discord - Fixed Some Major Issues
plugin_instructions: go to https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me and create your App and credentials. Add them to the plugin settings and then use the login/signup action in a workflow to log in via discord. Can also use the "Get Users" API call to save user info to Bubble. want to help me build a better plugin with emojis and more please join me at http://join.dislist.me *(vanity discord invite)
